channel.title: (Delta help request)
channel.description: First of all, please don't ramble about how unstable it is.. I am requesting help from the community. I am using the delta cleaned base from arhams pack. I am just starting to explore coding, so bare with me. Basically, I am not at my comp atm, so I won't be able to post any code or files. Basically, the error is that when the player logins the first time, they create there character and it's fine. If they logout, and login again, it makes them create there character again.. But thats not my main concern. Another problem is, if they have one item in there inventory, it doubles itself when players relogs. Will thank for help. (Also, please explain the fix you have so I can learn, and not be spoonfed.)
